product.name: Brushed Nickel Bathroom Light Fixtures, 3-Light Modern Vanity Lighting Over Mirror with Opal White Glass Shades, E26 Socket Wall Mounted Lamp for Bedroom Hallway
product.description:
Is the light fixture dimmable?
The light itself is not dimmable, but it is fully dimmable when used with a dimmable bulb and compatible dimmer switch. The bulb and dimmer switch are not included.
Do you have any recommended bulbs?
This light fixture is compatible with any E26 base LED bulb, CFL, Halogen, Incandescent, Energy Saving Bulb, you could please try.
What should I do if I find the glass lampshade broken after receiving the package?
If you find any breakage after receiving the product, please use our after-sales service, and we will provide you with a perfect solution.
is
a professional manufacturer of light fixture, integrating development and production. Our main products include wall light, chandelier and porch light.
At WINSHEN, we truly believe everyone deserves a better life.  So, we commited to design high-quality, classic lighting ensure reliable performance for years to come.
In WINSHEN, you can find the right light that create the wonderful atmosphere to enjoy with your friends and family.
product.bullet_points:
• 1 - [DURABLE CONSTRUCTION] - WINSHEN vanity light features high quliaty heavy metal construction and outstanding rust resistance finish, which will provide you with long term durability with the sleek elegant design
• 2 - [STYLISH DESIGN] - The opal white glass lampshades help with brightness, providing you soft light instead of a harsh glare, which adds modern & industrial touch to your home
• 3 - [EASY INSTALLATION] - This wall light for bathroom can be installed facing up or down. No switch or cord on the light, just connect to the reserved wire directly. All mounting hardware and instruction for quick and easy installation
• 4 - [LIGHT SOURCE] - E26 medium or standard bulb base. Max 60W, Compatible with any E26 base LED bulb, CFL, Halogen, Incandescent, Energy Saving Bulb. Note: Bulbs are not included
• 5 - [SINCERE SERVICE] - Any further assistance with the bathroom light fixtures, or the glass shade broken, you could click on "WINSHEN HOME" and then click on "Ask a question" to contact us, we will provide the glass replacement and solve all the
